text: bingqie paiqian yi wei shizhe, dui nimen xuandu zhenzhu de xuduo mingxian de jixiang, yibian ta shi xindao erqie xingshan de renmen, tuoli chongchong hei'an, zou ru guangming. Shui xindao erqie xingshan, zhenzhu jiang shi shui ru xia lin zhu he de leyuan, er yong ju qizhong. Zhenzhu biding shangci tamen youmei de jiyang.
